default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Whoa, talk about a welcome party... So you're that legendary hero Chief the little mouse kept talking about, the one who's saved DisCity and the loaded big shot backer? Haha. Cool. Looks like you'll be the one who's got my back in DisCity~

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Fair and square? You must be kidding. This is a "duel", y'know what I'm saying?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Get in the car, sweetheart. Don't mind about your luggage. What really matters is who you're wandering the world with.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Be patient, darling... Get in line. We've got enough ammo.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Look at all this fancy stuff. Sorry, all mine now.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Stop freezing up like a statue! Hurry and run!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: I wish you... a safe journey!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Please take me back... to my WhiteSands...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Working? At this hour? Pff, c'mon. Let's go for a ride in WhiteSands! Oh, I-I mean, let's take on a patrol in WhiteSands, Chief.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Hmph, I wonder which genius made this wanted poster. The face doesn't match the name at all! No wonder they can never catch anyone. Can't blame me for that.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: It's nice here in DisCity. No storms. No desert bandits. You don't even have to skimp on Hypercubes. Do we need more people in the Bureau, Chief? I know a few friends who might wanna work here.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Let me see... korryn. Wanted fugitive in WhiteSands. Active around the route... Extremely dangerous. Reward: Thirty million DisCoins? Wow, they upped it again!

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: To make it in WhiteSands, you need a weapon that's not just powerful but looks badass too... Check this outâ€”way cooler than a reFile:volver, right? Want me to hook you up with a pair?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I've seen plenty of folks say, "Just one last job, then I'm done." But it's never the last. And they all ended up losing their money and their lives. Sigh, poor old pal. At least he got to be buried with his precious treasure in the white sands.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Have you ever seen a clear night in WhiteSands? The storm stops and there's no one around. The world is just the shifting sands beneath your feet and the vast starry sky above... For me, being in that world is true freedom.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Stop right there! Leave your valuables. Wallet, jewelry, luggage... Huh? Haven't got anything? Then I'll have no choice but to take you with me!

default.title: Idle
default.text: Sheriff, once we conquer the WhiteSands, what do you say we give you... a new hat to lie on. How about that?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Bored, huh? Why don't we play a game? Do you know how many bullets it takes to trace the shape of a human?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Want some alone time with me? Don't just stare... you'll have to try harder than that.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: I'm expensive, little Chief. Got your payment ready?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Come on, show me the money and you'll get what you ask for.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Wow, DisCity technology!

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Let's go! Time for a big heist!

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: I guess you don't know what happened to those people who touched my hair, they all... Haha. Relax, you're different.

aureate_ambush.title: Level Up
aureate_ambush.text: The best things always fall right into my lap.

aureate_ambush.title: Obtain Attire
aureate_ambush.text: Not bad, finding this place. You've got some skill. Just thirty seconds ago, this was a WhiteSands bandit treasure den. Now—it's Tuco territory.

aureate_ambush.title: Greeting
aureate_ambush.text: Oh? How surprising... the winds of this underground cavern rarely drag in such a distinguished guest. Tell me, Chief—are you here to be my big, juicy prize, or to become my partner in crime?

aureate_ambush.title: Ordinary Contact 1
aureate_ambush.text: Those petty desert bandits... risking their lives for treasure only to hide it away, letting it waste away in the sands. What a shame... Fortunately, these precious things found their way to me. I'd say they've finally found a proper home.

aureate_ambush.title: Ordinary Contact 2
aureate_ambush.text: Not to brag, but with this big fella and my furs, just sitting here is enough to keep every desert bandit and outlaw at bay... Oh, and don't forget to keep your MBCC badge out on your jacket.

aureate_ambush.title: Idle
aureate_ambush.text: Hey Sheriff, before these gold coins get confiscated, let me get you fitted with a gold chain. Then you'll be the most dazzling lizard in all of WhiteSands!

aureate_ambush.title: Annoyed
aureate_ambush.text: Darling, according to the rules, before you get handsy with me, you have to say "Please, Boss Korryn, I'm begging you." Hmm? Since when is that a rule? Since I made it up just now!

aureate_ambush.title: Special Attention
aureate_ambush.text: Oho, you're so forward darling! Did you want to have a heart-to-heart with me, or maybe—something more adult? I'm talking about splitting these treasures, of course. What on earth did you think I meant?
